body_html:
Oh, too bad. When reading the stackoverflow answer, I really thought, that this feature is almost done :-)

I was thinking about using Keras (the first time) for my next project. But since I have over 100GB TFRecord-Files as training data, this seems not to be an good option currently.

However thank you very much for driving this topic. If there was a prototype implementation, I would have tested it with pleasure. But for a full implementation, I think I do not have enough knowledge about Keras at the moment. So I cannot help much. Thus I will check again in some month, if your ideas are implemented. Keep going 👍

body:
Oh, too bad. When reading the stackoverflow answer, I really thought, that this feature is almost done :-) 

I was thinking about using Keras (the first time) for my next project. But since I have over 100GB TFRecord-Files as training data, this seems not to be an good option currently. 

However thank you very much for driving this topic. If there was a prototype implementation, I would have tested it with pleasure. But for a full implementation, I think I do not have enough knowledge about Keras at the moment. So I cannot help much. Thus I will check again in some month, if your ideas are implemented. Keep going 👍
